name: databricks-mcp-server_execute_sql
description: Executes SQL statements on a Databricks warehouse and returns the results

execution_timeout_seconds.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait for query execution

max_rows.description: Maximum number of rows to return in the result

warehouse_id.description: ID of the warehouse to use for execution. If not specified, the first available warehouse will be used

name: databricks-mcp-server_get_table
description: Gets detailed information about a single Databricks table

full_name.description: Full name of the table in format 'catalog.schema.table'

name: databricks-mcp-server_list_catalogs
description: Lists all catalogs available in the Databricks workspace

name: databricks-mcp-server_list_schemas
description: Lists all schemas in a specified Databricks catalog

catalog.description: Name of the catalog to list schemas from

name: databricks-mcp-server_list_tables
description: Lists all tables in a specified Databricks schema with optional filtering

catalog.description: Name of the catalog containing the schema

max_results.description: Maximum number of tables to return (0 for all, non-recommended)

omit_columns.description: Whether to omit column details in the response

omit_properties.description: Whether to omit table properties in the response, helps to reduce response size

schema.description: Name of the schema to list tables from

table_name_pattern.description: Regular expression pattern to filter table names

name: databricks-mcp-server_list_warehouses
description: Lists all SQL warehouses available in the Databricks workspace
